pageTitle: Waitrose British pork shoulder with apple and sage stuffing - Waitrose
textBeforeTable: Nutrition Allergy Advice: For allergens see ingredients in bold Ingredients Pork shoulder (83%), pork rind, pork belly (6%), apple, demerara sugar, sage, salt, parsley, black pepper, preservative sodium metabisulphite Waitrose pigs are reared to produce high quality, succulent pork that is tender and full of flavour. We work with a long-established group of dedicated farms; selecting them for their high standards of animal husbandry, welfare and a commitment to sustainable farming. Product Summary Add to a list Add to Favourites Add to trolley – + kg g lb Each £ Unit of measure: 035680 Joints 1 5.76 C62
textAfterTable: Typical values as prepared Oven Cook From Chilled/Ambient Preheat oven. Remove all packaging. Place in a roasting tray in centre of oven. Cook thoroughly until the juices run clear and there is no pink meat. Cover with foil and rest for 10-15 minutes before carving. Cooks Tip: To achieve good crackling, brush the rind with little oil and salt.
